Articles.Content:
Then unemployment will reduce.

What if the asteroid belt moved inwards to Earth's orbit?

Armageddon. The movie.

What if- 1034810418204148 ERROR

Then- Error: C:\Proj1\Uni1\Earth\Mud\Sun.exe has stopped functioning. Abort, Retry, Fail?

What if Sun was stuck in the water on the top of a drying salt sea?

I would evaporate it, since, after all, I AM the Sun not.

What if the Internet didn't exist?

Then I would be wondering how I got that.

What if the internet had 6 ears?

Then it would get corrupt in terms of data, and possibly in terms of politics.

What if Algodoo was 3D?

Then people would still wonder what it was.

What if the year was 1632?

Then no KSP.

What if Gravity had a better plot?

It would be Kerbal Space Program: The Movie.

What if you all were actually inside my head and I'm just going insane?!

Then we would reassure you to stay calm and smell the blood.

Stay calm and wake up.

What if it was the easy that made it great?

Is that related to the post before yours?

I wouldn't have had to translate it.

What if Scott Manley was TERRIBLE at K.S.P?
Then he would be hailed as the worst, and we would watch all his videos, and as he got better at the game no one would care. We would also hail Stanley Gotington as the best.

Nothing? oh goodie.

What if SQUAD was ran by women?

Then Kerbals would be pink and SRBs would leave a trail of rainbows and glitter.

What if President Obama hates hamburgers?

Then he would pretend to love hamburgers.

What if KSP mods could be unlocked on the tech tree?

Then we would have kraken problems.

What is 5 year olds were allowed to drink alcohol?

Every night people would have to board up their windows.

What if you were me and I was you?
you would be tired. what if goat demons ruled the world?

(Don't know why no one replied to this)

We would be in the exact same position we are in now.

What if Arstotzka was a real state?

Then i wouldn't bother googling it because you wouldn't ask that.

What if women were the 1st to fly to the Moon?

Their plane would most likely fail. (Gotta be more specific)

What if there was no moon?

Then we would have had to send men to Mars (& back) instead. Also no funny behavior of water on Earth.

What if all automobile manufacturers were ran by women?

Cars would be more efficient and had super compact over-engineered luxury stuff in them. But slower.

What if a ramjet rams a ramjet?

*BOOM*

What if a black hole collided with a wormhole?
